languages.text: "Согласно двадцати томам проповедника Ойстаха-Истафана Забытого, жестокость и милосердие идут рука об руку по миру, но людей всегда склоняет только одна чаша весов. Так что бы выбрали вы — внушать своим подданным страх? Или благоговение?"

traits.locale_text: "Согласно двадцати томам проповедника Ойстаха-Истафана Забытого, жестокость и милосердие идут рука об руку по миру, но людей всегда склоняет только одна чаша весов. Так что бы выбрали вы — внушать своим подданным страх? Или благоговение?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"
languages.original_text: "Согласно двадцати томам проповедника Ойстаха-Истафана Забытого, жестокость и милосердие идут рука об руку по миру, но людей всегда склоняет только одна чаша весов. Так что бы выбрали вы — внушать своим подданным страх? Или благоговение?"

traits.locale_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers or be magnanimous and choose awe?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers or be magnanimous and choose awe?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “根据布道士‘被遗忘者’奥斯塔奇·伊斯塔凡的二十本经典著作所称，仁慈与残忍在这个世界上并驾齐驱，但人们只会对天平的其中一端趋之若鹜。你是更愿意让你的追随者惧怕你，还是愿意仁慈对待他们，让他们对你充满敬意？”
languages.original_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"

traits.locale_text: “根据布道士‘被遗忘者’奥斯塔奇·伊斯塔凡的二十本经典著作所称，仁慈与残忍在这个世界上并驾齐驱，但人们只会对天平的其中一端趋之若鹜。你是更愿意让你的追随者惧怕你，还是愿意仁慈对待他们，让他们对你充满敬意？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Según los veinte tomos escritos por el predicador Oystach-Istafan el Olvidado, la misericordia y la crueldad van de la mano por el mundo, pero la gente se apoya solo en un lado de la balanza. ¿Preferiría inspirar temor en sus seguidores o ejercer la magnanimidad e inspirar admiración?».
languages.original_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"

traits.locale_text: «Según los veinte tomos escritos por el predicador Oystach-Istafan el Olvidado, la misericordia y la crueldad van de la mano por el mundo, pero la gente se apoya solo en un lado de la balanza. ¿Preferiría inspirar temor en sus seguidores o ejercer la magnanimidad e inspirar admiración?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「忘られし伝道師オイスタック＝イスタファンが著した20冊の書物によれば、慈悲と残酷は手を取り合って世界を貫くが、人々は天秤の一方の皿にのみ群がるといいます。{name}様は従者たちに恐怖心を抱かせるか、それとも大らかに畏敬の念を抱かせるか、どちらなのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"

traits.locale_text: 「忘られし伝道師オイスタック＝イスタファンが著した20冊の書物によれば、慈悲と残酷は手を取り合って世界を貫くが、人々は天秤の一方の皿にのみ群がるといいます。{name}様は従者たちに恐怖心を抱かせるか、それとも大らかに畏敬の念を抱かせるか、どちらなのでしょう？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Gemäß der zwanzig Folianten des Priesters Oystach-Istafan des Vergessenen gehen Gnade und Grausamkeit auf der Welt Hand in Hand, aber die Menschen strömen nur zu einer Schale der Waage. Würdet Ihr eher Angst in Euren Anhängern schüren oder großmütig sein und auf Ehrfurcht setzen?"
languages.original_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß der zwanzig Folianten des Priesters Oystach-Istafan des Vergessenen gehen Gnade und Grausamkeit auf der Welt Hand in Hand, aber die Menschen strömen nur zu einer Schale der Waage. Würdet Ihr eher Angst in Euren Anhängern schüren oder großmütig sein und auf Ehrfurcht setzen?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « D'après les vingt tomes écrits par le prêcheur Oystach-Istafan l'Oublié, alors que la miséricorde et la cruauté sont les deux faces d'une même pièce, la majorité des gens se contentent de l'une des deux. Dites-moi, préférez-vous inspirer la peur ou l'admiration ? »
languages.original_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"

traits.locale_text: « D'après les vingt tomes écrits par le prêcheur Oystach-Istafan l'Oublié, alors que la miséricorde et la cruauté sont les deux faces d'une même pièce, la majorité des gens se contentent de l'une des deux. Dites-moi, préférez-vous inspirer la peur ou l'admiration ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Vaiz Unutulmuş Oystach-İstafan'ın kaleme aldığı yirmi kitaba göre merhamet ve zalimlik ayrı düşünülemez ama insanlar terazinin yalnızca bir tartısına üşüşürler. Takipçilerinin yüreğinde korku yaratmayı mı tercih edersin yoksa yüce gönüllülüğünle hayranlık uyandırmayı mı?"
languages.original_text: "According to the twenty tomes penned by the preacher Oystach-Istafan the Forgotten, mercy and cruelty go through the world hand in hand, but people flock only to one pan of the scales. Would you rather inspire fear in your followers, or be magnanimous and choose awe?"

traits.locale_text: "Vaiz Unutulmuş Oystach-İstafan tarafından kaleme alınan yirmi kitaba göre merhamet ve zalimlik ayrı düşünülemez ama insanlar terazinin yalnızca bir tartısına üşüşürler. Takipçilerinin yüreğinde korku yaratmayı mı tercih edersin yoksa yüce gönüllülüğünle hayranlık uyandırmayı mı?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
